at.pwd.boardgame.game.agent

Interface HumanAgent<GameType extends Game,ActionType extends AgentAction>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Agent<GameType,ActionType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MancalaHumanAgent

    public interface HumanAgent<GameType extends Game,ActionType extends AgentAction>
extends Agent<GameType,ActionType>
    An agent that is played by a human.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleAction(GameType game, java.lang.String id)
      HumanAgent has the additional "handleAction" method which is called when the human interacted with the board.

      • Methods inherited from interface at.pwd.boardgame.game.agent.Agent

        doTurn

    • Method Detail

      • handleAction

        void handleAction(GameType game,
                  java.lang.String id)
        HumanAgent has the additional "handleAction" method which is called when the human interacted with the board.
        Parameters:
        game - The game where the action is executed
        id - What slot id has been selected by this agent
